attributes.action: To stop deducting carers allowance from benefits
attributes.additional_details: To stop deducting carers from benefits and penalising us for saving your government millions which leaves us out of pocket.
attributes.background:
To stop deducting carers from our benefits 
Us carers who struggle to look after our families etc get penalised and have it removed off of benefits. We on carers save the government millions every year for caring for families and close relatives. For a low amount then get the whole lot deducted

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/631161
